bio: I'm a software engineer with over 11 years of experience in software development and technical leadership. I have extensive experience with product and software development lifecycles: from ideation, architecture, and design to development, testing, deployment, performance, and security.

skillCategories.title: Technologies
items: AI/ML (RAG pipelines, knowledge graphs, classifiers, nearest-neighbor, etc)

skillCategories.title: Architecture and System Design
items: Distributed systems built with Docker and Kubernetes

skillCategories.title: Leadership
items: Building high performance cultures by emphasizing ownership and accountability
Leading and managing distributed engineering teams

skillCategories.title: Personal
items: High sense of ownership and and very self-motivated
Commitment to building business, domain, and product expertise
Strong interpersonal communication and relationship-building, even in remote teams

interests: an insatiable reader (news, engineering books/blogs, fiction)
an avid consumer of physical media (books, magazines, vinyl records, CDs)
a social gamer (just the occasional Magic: The Gathering draft with friends these days)
